name: Ghosthunter Mowdown
description:
Your goal as a ghost is to stay inside the walls of your haunted house.

If you find yourself outside your house for too long, you will cease to exist.

Ghost hunters wil try to knock you out of your house using plasma cannons.

The amount of knockback taken can be seen in bottom left corner.

You can utilize recoil from your shotgun for movement.

To lower your knockback multiplier, avoid getting hit.
